title: Servers?
body:
Are servers down for anybody else? 

3/06/2016 

:/

replies.body: This issue should be resolved now, can you all confirm/deny this for me?

Hey there,

The servers are [currently up](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce), however there is a known issue relating to logging in which is currently being investigated. I'll update this reply when I know more.
